Package jp.co.cam.universal.util.text.format.number

Interface NumberFormatIF

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractNumberFormat, NumberFormat, NumberFormat_AR, NumberFormat_AT, NumberFormat_BA, NumberFormat_BR, NumberFormat_CH, NumberFormat_DE, NumberFormat_DK, NumberFormat_ES, NumberFormat_FR, NumberFormat_GR, NumberFormat_ID, NumberFormat_IT, NumberFormat_NL, NumberFormat_RU, NumberFormat_SE, NumberFormat_TR
public interface NumberFormatIF
[universal](commons)Provides number format conversion functionality.
